scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm install && (cd client && npm run build)
scripts.test: npm install && (cd client && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e:headless)
scripts.lint: npm install && (cd client && npm run lint) && (cd server && npm run lint)
scripts.lintStaged: cd client && npx lint-staged && cd ../server && npx lint-staged
scripts.start_full_app: concurrently -n server,ui -c blue,green "npm run server_start" "npm run ui_start"
